body: @lightningbarer Yeah, because it's fucking FICTION, dude. People can ship whatever the fuck they want.

Ah...shippers around the world still going on this whole idea of the IchixRuki UrixHime thing after the author finished.

Shame really, I'd much prefer to see H of Orihime and Chizuru as the only one I know is Crimson. and that wasn't even real Yuri...

NOICE~~~


also, what's up dude? @xw20hx, can't someone even has their own fantasy ship?

Apenas maníacos apoiam uryu + orihime
F para está pessoa que desenhou tal heresia.
Die artist to ruin ichihime story! 🤬
This dude killed Ichigo and took his family, where's the broken mind tag?
ah yes a good happy end
I could swear this is nejoccoid artstyle

Kinda confused here, in the story their saying Ichigo and Inoue have been married so this should be after Bleach ending. Then Ishida say's Inoue tempted him over and over but that even if Ichigo's soul comes back he won't let her go? Does that mean he killed Ichigo then stole/raped Inoue till she became his and took in Ichigo's kid, since Kasui is the son between Ichigo and Inoue? This plot seems pretty dark if you think about it and read what Ishida is saying.
